categories.name: Math & Utility
categories.description: Mathematical functions and general utilities for shader calculations.

functions.name: elasticWave
functions.description: an elastic wave with exponential decay and sinusoidal oscillation.

functions.name: smoothStep
functions.description: interpolation between two values with smooth acceleration and deceleration.

functions.name: rotate2D
functions.description: a 2D vector by a given angle.

functions.name: exponentialRamp
functions.description: an exponential ramp function with derivative.

functions.name: logisticCurve
functions.description: a logistic (S-curve) function with derivative.

functions.name: stepSequence
functions.description: a stepped sequence with optional smoothing between steps.

params.name: steps
params.description: Number of steps in the sequence.

categories.name: Noise & Procedural
categories.description: Noise generation and procedural pattern functions for textures and effects.

functions.name: hash22
functions.description: a 2D hash from a 2D input vector for procedural generation.

functions.name: noise2D
functions.description: 2D Perlin-style noise for procedural textures and patterns.

functions.name: fbm
functions.description: Brownian Motion - combines multiple octaves of noise for complex patterns.

params.name: octaves
params.description: Number of noise octaves to combine.

functions.name: hash1D
functions.description: a 1D hash value from an input value for noise generation.

functions.name: hash31
functions.description: a 1D hash value from a 3D input vector.

functions.name: hash3D
functions.description: a 3D hash vector from a 3D input for displacement effects.

returns.description: result as 3D vector with values between -1 and 1.

functions.name: noise3D
functions.description: 3D noise using trilinear interpolation.

functions.name: warpNoise3D
functions.description: 3D warping noise using fractal Brownian motion.

returns.description: warp vector with values between -1 and 1.

categories.name: Signed Distance Fields
categories.description: SDF functions for procedural geometry and ray marching techniques.

functions.name: sdfCircle
functions.description: distance function for a circle.

returns.description: distance to circle surface (negative inside, positive outside).

functions.name: sdfBox
functions.description: distance function for a rectangular box.

returns.description: distance to box surface (negative inside, positive outside).

functions.name: sdfUnion
functions.description: two SDFs using union operation (closest surface).

returns.description: distance representing union of both shapes.

functions.name: sdfIntersection
functions.description: two SDFs using intersection operation (overlapping area only).

returns.description: distance representing intersection of both shapes.

functions.name: sdfSubtraction
functions.description: two SDFs using subtraction operation (first shape minus second).

params.name: d1
params.description: Distance from shape to subtract from.

returns.description: distance representing first shape with second subtracted.

functions.name: boxFrameSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a 3D box frame (hollow box).

returns.description: distance to the box frame surface.

functions.name: cappedTorusSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a capped torus.

returns.description: distance to the capped torus surface.

functions.name: capsuleSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a capsule (cylinder with rounded caps).

functions.name: coneSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a cone.

functions.name: cylinderSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a cylinder.

functions.name: ellipsoidSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for an ellipsoid.

functions.name: gyroidSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a gyroid surface.

params.name: scale
params.description: Scale factor for the gyroid pattern.

functions.name: hexagonalPrismSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a hexagonal prism.

returns.description: distance to the hexagonal prism surface.

functions.name: icosahedronSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for an icosahedron.

functions.name: juliaSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a 4D Julia set fractal.

returns.description: distance to the Julia set surface.

functions.name: octahedronSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for an octahedron.

functions.name: planeSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for an infinite plane.

params.name: normal
params.description: Normal vector of the plane (should be normalized).

functions.name: pyramidSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a pyramid.

functions.name: rhombusSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a rhombus.

functions.name: roundBoxSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a rounded box.

returns.description: distance to the rounded box surface.

functions.name: roundedConeSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a rounded cone.

returns.description: distance to the rounded cone surface.

functions.name: roundedCylinderSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a rounded cylinder.

returns.description: distance to the rounded cylinder surface.

functions.name: sphereSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a sphere.

functions.name: tetrahedronSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a tetrahedron.

functions.name: torusSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a torus.

functions.name: triangularPrismSDF
functions.description: a signed distance field for a triangular prism.

returns.description: distance to the triangular prism surface.

categories.name: Color & Graphics
categories.description: Color space conversion and palette generation functions.

functions.name: palette
functions.description: colors using cosine-based palette function for smooth color gradients.

functions.name: linearToSrgb
functions.description: linear RGB color values to sRGB color space.

functions.name: srgbToLinear
functions.description: sRGB color values to linear RGB color space.

functions.name: hue2rgb
functions.description: function for HSL to RGB conversion - converts hue component to RGB.

functions.name: hslToRgb
functions.description: HSL (Hue, Saturation, Lightness) color to RGB.

functions.name: bezierCubic
functions.description: a cubic Bezier curve and returns both value and derivative.

functions.name: easeIn
functions.description: ease-in function for smooth acceleration.

functions.name: easeOut
functions.description: ease-out function for smooth deceleration.

functions.name: easeInOut
functions.description: ease-in-out function for smooth acceleration and deceleration.

functions.name: elasticIn
functions.description: ease-in function with oscillating motion.

functions.name: elasticOut
functions.description: ease-out function with oscillating motion.

functions.name: backIn
functions.description: ease-in function that overshoots before settling.

functions.name: backOut
functions.description: ease-out function that overshoots before settling.

functions.name: springPhysics
functions.description: spring animation with configurable parameters.

functions.name: triangleWave
functions.description: a triangle wave with configurable frequency and amplitude.

functions.name: sawtoothWave
functions.description: a sawtooth wave with linear ramp.

functions.name: squareWave
functions.description: a square wave with configurable duty cycle.

params.name: dutyCycle
params.description: Duty cycle (0-1) for wave on/off ratio.

functions.name: pulseWave
functions.description: a pulse wave with smooth falloff edges.

functions.name: chirpWave
functions.description: a chirp wave with linearly changing frequency.

functions.name: noiseWave
functions.description: a wave using interpolated noise for organic variation.

functions.name: sdfOpUnion
functions.description: two SDFs using union operation (logical OR).

functions.name: sdfOpSubtract
functions.description: one SDF from another (A - B).

params.name: distanceB
params.description: Second signed distance field to subtract.

functions.name: sdfOpIntersect
functions.description: two SDFs (logical AND).

functions.name: sdfSmoothUnion
functions.description: two SDFs using smooth union operation with configurable smoothing.

functions.name: sdfSmoothSubtract
functions.description: one SDF from another with smooth blending.

params.name: distanceB
params.description: Second signed distance field to subtract.

functions.name: sdfSmoothIntersect
functions.description: two SDFs with smooth blending.

functions.name: sdfChamferUnion
functions.description: two SDFs using chamfer union operation with hard edges.

functions.name: sdfChamferSubtract
functions.description: one SDF from another using chamfer operation.

params.name: distanceB
params.description: Second signed distance field to subtract.

functions.name: sdfChamferIntersect
functions.description: two SDFs using chamfer operation.

functions.name: sdfTranslate
functions.description: an SDF by moving its position.

functions.name: sdfScale
functions.description: an SDF uniformly or non-uniformly.

functions.name: sdfRotate
functions.description: an SDF around a pivot point with Euler angles.

params.name: angles
params.description: Rotation angles in radians (x, y, z).

functions.name: sdfMirror
functions.description: an SDF across a plane defined by a normal vector.

params.name: normal
params.description: Normal vector of the mirror plane.

params.name: offset
params.description: Distance offset of the mirror plane.

functions.name: sdfPolarRepeat
functions.description: polar repetition around an axis.

params.name: count
params.description: Number of repetitions around the circle.

params.name: axis
params.description: Axis to repeat around (should be normalized).

functions.name: sdfCylindricalRepeat
functions.description: cylindrical coordinate repetition.

functions.name: sdfSphericalRepeat
functions.description: spherical coordinate repetition.

functions.name: sdfTwist
functions.description: a continuous rotation around an axis proportional to distance along that axis.

params.name: angle
params.description: Twist angle in radians per unit distance.

params.name: axis
params.description: Axis to twist around (should be normalized).

functions.name: sdfBend
functions.description: geometry along a specified axis creating a smooth curve.

params.name: axis
params.description: Axis normal to the bending plane.

functions.name: sdfTaper
functions.description: a linear taper effect along an axis.

params.name: amount
params.description: Taper amount (0 = no taper, 1 = full taper).

params.name: height
params.description: Height over which to apply the taper.

functions.name: sdfDisplace
functions.description: SDF using noise or other displacement functions.

functions.name: sdfDomainRepeat
functions.description: domain repetition with optional warping for complex patterns.

functions.name: sdfFiniteRepeat
functions.description: finite repetition with specified count along each axis.

params.name: count
params.description: Number of repetitions along each axis.

functions.name: sdfInfiniteRepeat
functions.description: infinite repetition along all axes.

functions.name: sdfToSolid
functions.description: a signed distance field to a solid boolean value.

returns.description: if solid, 0.0 if not (as f32 for compatibility).

functions.name: sdfToStroke
functions.description: a signed distance field to a stroke/outline.

functions.name: sdfToSmoothSolid
functions.description: a signed distance field to a smooth solid with anti-aliasing.

functions.name: sdfToSmoothStroke
functions.description: a signed distance field to a smooth stroke with anti-aliasing.
